Big Fish Games.info: A casual gaming company, bought by Churchill Downs in 2014.

Isilon.info: A data storage company, bought by EMC in 2010.

Qumulo.info: A data storage company that has raised about $100 million from investors.

ReplyYes.info: A message-based e-commerce company, selling records and graphic novels.

Smilebox.info: A digital photo products company, bought by Perion in 2012.

Appnique.info: A company that provides targeted marketing for apps.

Sqoop.info: A company that scrapes lawsuits and public documents on businesses to aid journalists.

Flowplay.info: A casual gaming company that emphasizes the social aspect of online gaming.

AdXpose.info: An advertising analytics company, bought by comScore for $22 million in 2011.

SquareHub.info: A private social networking company for families.

Fierce Inc..info: An executive coaching company that helps businesses with effective communication methods.

LUX Media.info: An agency providing all sorts of multimedia services.

Hughes Media Law Group.ceo: Joleen Winther Hughes, Founder and Principal
Hughes Media Law Group.info: A company that provides legal services for media and other businesses.

Syntonic Inc..info: A company that provides sponsored data to mobile carriers and other businesses

Communique PR.info: A boutique PR firm based in Seattle's Interbay neighborhood.

Remitly.info: A remittance company that people send money internationally using a mobile phone.

RealNetworks.info: A dot-com darling that has since been downsized but persists in the streaming and digital media market.
